document.full_text: by raising the rewards for innovation, won't higher food prices prompt creative efforts by companies and farmers to break the barriers and produce more? even a passing familiarity with history suggests that the answer must be yes. and yet...
document.title: malthus and the future of food
lines_and_colors: by raising the rewards for innovation, won't higher food prices prompt creative efforts by companies and farmers to break the barriers and produce more? even a passing familiarity with history suggests that the answer must be yes. and yet...
